name: gym-go
description: Aplicação GymGo para gerenciamento de check-ins em academias.

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_ENV=TEST APP_AMBIENT=QA DB_NAME=db_test_gym_go jest -c jest.config.cjs --runInBand --injectGlobals false --testPathPattern=.*/src/.+\.spec\.ts$
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_ENV=TEST APP_AMBIENT=QA DB_NAME=db_test_gym_go jest -c jest.config.cjs --runInBand --injectGlobals false --testPathPattern=.*/tests/e2e/.+\.spec\.ts$
scripts.test:watch: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_ENV=TEST APP_AMBIENT=QA DB_NAME=db_test_gym_go jest -c jest.config.cjs --watch --injectGlobals false
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_ENV=TEST APP_AMBIENT=QA DB_NAME=db_test_gym_go jest -c jest.config.cjs --coverage --injectGlobals false

author: Luiz Henrique
